description: This Python module defines data models and an abstract repository interface for managing notes in a note-taking application. It includes a dataclass for Note representations, an in-memory repository implementation, and interface methods for CRUD operations, supporting future extension with database-backed storage.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: A dataclass representing the internal structure of a note, including methods to generate timestamps and create new notes.

classes.name: NotesRepository
classes.description: An abstract base class defining the interface for note repositories, including methods for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and deleting notes.

classes.name: InMemoryNotesRepository
classes.description: A concrete implementation of NotesRepository that stores notes in memory for testing and development purposes.

methods.name: Note.now_iso
methods.description: Static method returning the current UTC time in ISO 8601 format with a trailing 'Z'.

methods.name: Note.new
methods.description: Class method to create a new Note with a unique ID and timestamps.

methods.name: NotesRepository.list
methods.description: Abstract method to list notes with pagination.

methods.name: NotesRepository.get
methods.description: Abstract method to retrieve a note by its ID.

methods.name: NotesRepository.create
methods.description: Abstract method to create a new note.

methods.name: NotesRepository.update
methods.description: Abstract method to update an existing note's fields.

methods.name: NotesRepository.delete
methods.description: Abstract method to delete a note by ID.

methods.name: InMemoryNotesRepository.list
methods.description: Returns a paginated list of notes stored in memory along with pagination metadata.

methods.name: InMemoryNotesRepository.get
methods.description: Retrieves a note from in-memory storage by ID.

methods.name: InMemoryNotesRepository.create
methods.description: Creates and stores a new note in memory.

methods.name: InMemoryNotesRepository.update
methods.description: Updates an existing note in memory.

methods.name: InMemoryNotesRepository.delete
methods.description: Removes a note from in-memory storage by ID.
